item.title: Sprouted Green Gram
item.description: Sprouted Green Gram How to make it? take a hand full of green gram soak it in a vessel for at least 8 hours do any one of the following filter the green gram and tie it a damp cloth and hang it place it in a spouted jar place it in a vessel and cover it by a lid with small holes on it. leave it for 8 hours
